blocks.Text:
We are currently closed for submissions. 


Each person can send only 2 entries across genres with a maximum of one submission per entry (eg. 1 prose and 1 poetry). However, only one of the two will be picked for the bi-annual. 


All submissions will be made as a word document (**12 font, Times New Roman, Double Spaced**) with a brief biography in third person. Short fiction/prose should be less than 4000 words. A maximum of 3 poems can be submitted. Non-fiction pieces need to be less than 2000 words. For photo essays, a maximum of 12 photographs along with a write-up needs to be submitted. Upon being published, writers are allowed to retain copyrights of their works, but they are not simultaneously allowed to publish it in other sites. 


If the work submitted is found to be plagiarized, it will immediately be rejected and will not be considered for publication. 


**For queries write to us at csgs@ashoka.edu.in**
